EmailTemplate.name: NUR-2021FY-EM-Broker-Nurture.nurture-11
EmailTemplate.subject: Personalized, actionable and timely healthcare
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Partner with Teladoc Health and provide your clients with world-class engagement Teladoc Health is your sole virtual care partner, offering products that work together to extend your benefits package. This includes dedicated Client Success Teams to ensure world‑class member engagement. Whether members need to consult with a doctor, talk to a therapist or compare local prices for a prescription, our HealthiestYou Complete Bundle offering has got you covered. An intuitive, easy‑to‑use platform - Members initiate care through the app, web or phone - On‑demand or scheduled appointments available - Visit with physicians via phone or video - Members receive a visit summary and can pick up prescriptions at local pharmacies About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals. Unsubscribe <[[https://go1.teladochealth.com/subscriptions.html]]> | Privacy <[[https://teladochealth.com/privacy-policy/]]> | Legal Notice <[[https://teladochealth.com/notice-of-non-discrimination/]]> © 2021 Teladoc Health, Inc.
